org.apache.twill.api
Class AbstractTwillRunnable

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.twill.api.AbstractTwillRunnable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, TwillRunnable
public abstract class AbstractTwillRunnable
extends Object
implements TwillRunnable

This abstract class provides default implementation of the TwillRunnable.

configure

public TwillRunnableSpecification configure()
Description copied from interface: TwillRunnable
Called at submission time. Executed on the client side.

Specified by:
configure in interface TwillRunnable
Returns:
A TwillRunnableSpecification built by TwillRunnableSpecification.Builder.

initialize

public void initialize(TwillContext context)
Description copied from interface: TwillRunnable
Called when the container process starts. Executed in container machine. If any exception is thrown from this method, this runnable won't get retry.

Specified by:
initialize in interface TwillRunnable
Parameters:
context - Contains information about the runtime context.

handleCommand

public void handleCommand(Command command)
                   throws Exception
Description copied from interface: TwillRunnable
Called when a command is received. A normal return denotes the command has been processed successfully, otherwise Exception should be thrown.

Specified by:
handleCommand in interface TwillRunnable
Parameters:
command - Contains details of the command.
Throws:

stop

public void stop()
Description copied from interface: TwillRunnable
Requests to stop the running service.

Specified by:
stop in interface TwillRunnable

destroy

public void destroy()
Description copied from interface: TwillRunnable
Called when the Runnable.run() completed. Useful for doing resource cleanup. This method would only get called if the call to TwillRunnable.initialize(TwillContext) was successful.

Specified by:
destroy in interface TwillRunnable
